page.title: 14Family Life cont.
page.content: (Continued from previous page) Then we have tea.After tea I either play in the garden,read,draw or watch T.V.At about 9 pm.I go to bed. ************* The next description was written by a girl whose father works but not her mother. ************* As I live in another village I go to school on a bus.The bus picks me up at 08.10 each morning and if I am to catch the bus I must be ready to leave home at 08.00.I get up at 07.00.My mum is up before this and she prepares my breakfast and packs my school bag.I arrive at school at 08.30 and spend the time before school starts playing and chatting with my friends.After school I arrive home at about 16.30. The T.V.usually goes straight on when I have put away my bag and coat.
